name: Caesar Clown
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and reveal up to one [Smiley] and put it into your hand. Place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck. Then play up to one [Smiley] from your hand.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and reveal up to one [Smiley] and put it into your hand. Place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck. Then play up to one [Smiley] from your hand.
